posts.post_content:
PSA 1 T206 Deacon Phillippe with Carolina Brights back $325 - SOLD

As you can see it has several creases. There is also a tear which is best viewed on the back stretching from the left edge just above the "cigarettes" banner. It travels right up to the left side of the laurel wreath.

Since they started keeping track of back types, PSA has graded only 217 Carolina Brights. By comparison they've graded 590 Brown Hindus and 188 Broadleaf 350's. It's a very tough back.

First EMAIL or PM saying I'll take it, gets it.

My email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
